why annotate?
https://blog.datawrapper.de/text-in-data-visualizations/

---

Things to consider
- don't center-align text
- don't make readers turn their heads
- use labels if text sits on top of data
- eliminate jargon
- conversational first, precise later
- choose suitable number format

---

Packages:

- ggrepel for easy labeling
- ggforce for annotation

Manually:

- `geom_text()` & `geom_label()`
- `annotate()`
